TypeTooltip.Tooltip: Main object containing all save data
Contains most building and vehicle power network, inventory, and settings-related, information
Stores information regarding the contents of machine buffers, crates, crash site drop pods, player and doggo inventories, etc.
Contains the FactoryGame tag and nothing else
Contains multiple persistent objects such as story progress, Paleberry bush locations, the game time manager, etc.

Contains data about equipment such as placed beacons, portable miners, chainsaws, destructible rocks, etc.\nEach tool that exists in the save contains its own tag here, regardless of its location (storage box, equipped, dropped in world)
Contains data about placed and equipped beacons
Contains data about beacons placed in world: name, color, position
Stores beacon equipped in active arm slot
Contains data about Cups
Stores Cup equipped in active arm slot
Contains data about destructible rocks
Contains data about the position of large destructible rocks
Contains data about the position of small destructible rocks
Contains data about chainsaws
Contains data about chainsaw stored fuel
Contains data about statues
Stores statue equipped in active arm slot
Contains data about Medicinal Inhalers
Stores Medicinal Inhaler equipped in active arm slot
Contains data about Xeno-Bashers
Stores Xeno-Basher equipped in active arm slot
Contains data about Gas Masks
Contains data about Factory Carts
Stores Factory Cart equipped in active arm slot
Contains data about Jetpacks
Stores Jetpack equipped in body slot
Contains data about Blade Runners
Stores Blade Runners equipped in body slot
Contains data about Object Scanners
Stores Object Scanner equipped in active arm slot
Contains data about Hazmat Suits
Stores Hazmat Suit equipped in body slot
Contains data about Parachutes
Stores Parachute equipped in body slot
Contains data about Portable Miners
Stores Portable Miner equipped in active arm slot
Contains data about Rifles
Contains data about Rifles ammo and if is loaded
Contains data about Xeno-Zappers
Stores Xeno-Zapper equipped in active arm slot
Contains data about Rebar Guns
Contains data about Rebar Guns current ammo
Contains data about Color Guns
Contains data about Color Guns ammo and selected color slot
Contains buildable items like Vehicles, Buildings, Machines
Contains buildable items like foundations, ramps and so on
Contains list of all foundations placed in the world
Stores Foundations 8x2
Stores Foundations 8x4
Contains list of all ramps placed in the world
Stores Ramp 8x2
Stores Ramp 8x4
Contains list of all walls placed in the world
Contains list of all walkways placed in the world
Stores Walkway crossing
Contains list of all stairs placed in the world
Stores Stair going left
Stores Stair going right
Contains Blueprints (see blueprint tag for more info) and Crate location data
Contains locations and links to the inventory of death crates and 'inventory too full to pick up' item crates
Stores a Crate's (not Personal Storage) location and links it to its inventory, which is stored in Root > Script > FGInventoryComponent
Contains single-instance systems such as non-standard Color Gun color choices, the Game State tracker, in-game time tracking, etc.
Stores non-standard Color Gun color pairs
Stores the current time progress in the in-game day (in seconds) as well as the number of in-game days elapsed
Stores progress through the initial setup sequence of the game (building the HUB from the drop pod parts, progress through HUB tier 0 requirements, etc.
Stores links to other subsystems and game state data such as no cost and no power cheats
Stores last autosave number, save session name (presumably the one that appears when joining in multiplayer), and the name of the starting location (effects of changing this unknown)
Contains the Progression tag and nothing else
Contains managers related to game progression
Stores Space Elevator phase costs by name and remaining material counts towards each phase
Stores unlocked milestones, available milestones, selected milestone, progress towards selected milestone, and time since drop ship landing(?)
